title: Fullstack Developer
description: Trafficpoint tackles the challenge consumers face today of too many choices to sort through and too much data to digest. We operate a comparison site platform, across a number of different industries, that provides end-users with what they are seeking at that moment.

required: 1+ years of hands-on experience with frameworks like React/VueJS
1+ years of hands-on experience with Node.js
Experience in writing performant SQL (My SQL) through both raw queries and ORMs
advantage: Can-Do Attitude, Highly motivated, energetic and team player

title: Junior Frontend Developer
description: Infinity Next Management family is growing and looking for a Junior Full-stack Developer! You can be part of developing a new and innovative management platform that enables Check Point customers to configure, monitor and deploy all their security enforcement capabilities. Our management platform is constantly growing as an I/S for other Check Point products. We are looking for creative and passionate developer who fit our culture of emphasis on people, technology and business. This is an excellent opportunity for a junior developer to join a new product and working with cutting edge technologies.
skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
Team player with lots of energy and a positive attitude
Excellent Interpersonal skills and communication skills
Basic experience / Experience in development using Javascript

title: Software Engineering Student

Your code will process millions of online user actions, worldwide, every day. The resulting structured datasets are the most comprehensive ever generated for analysis and insight extraction purposes.
